infos.value: You wish to know what is happening in Wezette?
Lady Glaciela has no desire to see you become captives of King Khury.
What do you mean by that?
Did you not know? Lady Glaciela plans to usurp the throne.
Glaciela is already heir to the throne. Why would she need to do such a thing!?
The throne is hers by birthright...
It is for this purpose that she sent me to you.
That is not for you to decide!
Yes it is, because you would not survive a journey to Wezette without my assistance.
